title: Intro to Automotive Engr
description: Introduction to automotive engineering from a systems perspective. Major automotive systems and subsystems are described together with appropriate engineering models necessary for analysis and design.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 2202 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ME 3322 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ECE 3710 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
